name: circled-me
description: Circled is a minimalist, self-hosted social feed aggregator that combines news, RSS, and social posts into one streamlined UI. It helps users stay focused without complex dashboards or recommendations.

features.title: Feed Aggregator
features.description: Combine news, RSS, and social posts. Unified reading

features.title: Minimalist Design
features.description: Streamlined UI without clutter. Focused experience

features.title: No Recommendations
features.description: Chronological feed without algorithms. Your choice

features.title: Rss Integration
features.description: Follow blogs and news sites. Traditional feeds

features.title: Media Library
features.description: Aggregate social media content. One place

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Keep your reading habits private. Data control
